<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create Tag"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/content/tags"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Create a new tag.

You can find more information about tags [here](https://singularity.stereov.io/docs/guides/content/tags).

### Locale
The `locale` in the request body specifies which translation should be created.
The `locale` query parameter specifies which translation should be returned.

If no locale is specified, the applications default locale will be used.
You can learn more about configuring the default locale [here](https://singularity.stereov.io/docs/guides/configuration).

### Tokens
- A valid [`AccessToken`](https://singularity.stereov.io/docs/guides/auth/tokens#access-token)
  from a member of the [`CONTRIBUTOR`](https://singularity.stereov.io/docs/guides/content/introduction#global-server-group-contributor) group.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}

>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"The newly created tag.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"key":{"type":"string"},"locale":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"},"description":{"type":"string"}},"required":["description","key","locale","name"],"title":"TagResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Invalid or expired `AccessToken`.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"403":{"description":"`AccessToken` does not contain group membership [`CONTRIBUTOR`](https://singularity.stereov.io/docs/guides/content/introduction#global-server-group-contributor) access.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"409":{"description":"A tag with the given `key` already exists.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
